name: Tribal House
description: Prominent, syncopated rhythms of tribal drums such as toms and bongos on top of a House beat, usually resulting in a percussive, energetic sound, while ranging in mood.

children.name: Guaracha [EDM]
children.description: Originated in Colombia, featuring "fluttering" trumpets, accordion, and tambora drums.
